description: Jasper ... Jasper is kind of a quiet guy, but his sexy blue eyes and his young, eager-to-please ways are exactly what being a good Marine is all about. Jasper takes direction well and is always excited to be in front of the camera. In this scene he takes the reins and goes the extra mile. This is Jasper's second solo so he's a little more relaxed and ready to show you a good time. Spend twenty minutes getting to know Jasper better in this scene. This is another guy I'm sure we'll be seeing more of in the future. Jasper is extra horny (like every 19 year old) and it shows in this scene.
title: Jasper
